mapper.sql: id, user_id, favor_id, favor_type, delete_flag, update_time, insert_time
mapper.select: select id,user_id, favor_id,favor_type,delete_flag, date_format(insert_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as insert_time, date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as update_time, case favor_type when 1 then (select title from tb_self_driving_trowelling where id=favor_id ) when 3 then (select title from tb_question_and_article where id=favor_id ) when 4 then (select title from tb_information where id=favor_id ) when 5 then (select title from tb_promotion where id=favor_id ) when 6 then (select shop_name from tc_shop where id = (select shop_id from tb_rescue where id=favor_id )) when 7 then (select shop_name from tc_shop where id=favor_id ) end as title from tb_favor where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag!=1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_favor (id, user_id, favor_id, favor_type, delete_flag, update_time, insert_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0,NOW(),NOW())
